title: If France and Italy went to full-scale war, which one would win? - Quora

response.answer_text: After initial french success, Italians would win. French cannot understand Italian politics and would never be able to talk to the right leader. Furthermore, it is very questionable the Italians would listen even to the right leader. After one investment opportunity in Italy, French government would go broke for 500 years. Within one year of invasion, all the French government would suffer massive headaches and would finally give it up. As such, it is possible to invade but impossible to keep.
